# weights

**Type Property**

The key you use to access the weights of a layer in a neural network model.

## Declaration

```swift
class var weights: MLParameterKey { get }
```

## Discussion

The value type for the [doc://com.apple.coreml/documentation/CoreML/MLParameterKey/weights] key is an [doc://com.apple.coreml/documentation/CoreML/MLMultiArray]. You must scope this key with the name of the specific neural network layer whose weights you’d like to access. See [doc://com.apple.coreml/documentation/CoreML/MLParameterKey/scoped(to:)].



## Accessing neural network layer parameters

- **biases**: The key you use to access the biases of a layer in a neural network model.
